html:
12.21.17  10:15 pm   are you grieving the death of net neutrality?

     i barely even got a chance to celebrate its birth

12.21.17  10:06 pm   When are you going to do another video like the 'History of Japan' or 'History of the world I guess' Those are the greatest videos ever, it should be a tv show on every week.

     those take many months to make. to get them done every week would mean a lot of people would have to help, and i don't know if it would turn out the same

12.21.17  10:01 pm   can i get your new video on blu ray?

     i actually don't know what blu ray is but i have heard of it

12.21.17  9:40 pm   What video was the most fun to do?

     each one is more fun than the previous

12.21.17  8:35 pm   what should i do if i get really frustrated?

     try rotating things

12.21.17  7:02 pm   How do you handle anger?

     try to understand it

12.21.17  6:35 pm   when are you going to post again on youtube ?

     when the video i'm working on is done. this is a strategy i have always used, to ensure that incomplete videos are never posted. i hope that makes sense

12.21.17  6:12 pm   is the video, like, almost done, just sitting there looking incomplete,

     no

     what's going on fam

     i'm working on the video. what are you working on

12.21.17  5:48 pm   what is it like to be bored

     i'm not sure

12.21.17  4:35 pm   do you ever listen to other people's music recordings? from hints you've given, it seems you barely do, at least anymore. I won't ask whom you listen to, because I'm pretty sure you wouldn't tell. but do you think it's useful for your own creativity to do so?

     oh hell yeah

12.21.17  4:19 pm   thoughts on america?

     it's nice, you can have cake. maybe even eat the cake

12.21.17  3:50 pm   what type of soap do you like the most?

     ghost soap

12.21.17  3:03 pm   how do you decide what colors things should be?

     i decide based on the way they look, visually

12.21.17  3:03 pm   We're all just trying to be reasonable, but how will we know when we've achieved reasonableness?

     you can't. everything is reasonable and unreasonable at the same time. that's why it is an ongoing effort, of reasoning

12.21.17  3:02 pm   hey babe do you have a podcast that i can listen to

     i prefer not to call anything a podcast but maybe

12.21.17  2:53 pm   hey where'd the link to your instagram go?

     to the "other categories" page

12.21.17  2:38 pm   do you still write songs or are you too busy recording songs and their videos?

     the songs i am doing now are picked out of the whole catalog which includes even partially written songs. so that means a large percentage of the writing is done now

12.21.17  2:20 pm   choose your own adventure!
1) adventure 1
2) adventure 2

     those are not really my own adventures, those are your adventures that were pre-selected

12.21.17  2:13 pm   Can you change the dates to appear day/month/year rather than month/day/year? 

     i could but i'm not going to

12.21.17  12:30 pm   When was the last time you went on a spree?

     right now

     What kind of spree was it? 

     question answering

12.21.17  12:11 pm   hey bill what is the best spice?

     i have it written down somewhere

12.21.17  12:10 pm   Have you ever had a cool idea or realization from singing/coming up with lyrics for a song that you may have not come up with just sitting around thinkin bout stuff (in a non-music context)? 

     i'm not sure what you mean but yes. ideas can happen any time

12.21.17  11:32 am   what if I want the bells, but not the whistles

     you could build a rocket ship and send all the whistles into space. now they are space whistles

12.21.17  11:13 am   Are there any songs you've released that started as an idea during an improv session?

     there are some in the writing process but none that are released

12.21.17  10:44 am   how can a song be tasty, how does that work

     metaphor

12.21.17  10:44 am   looking forward to changing and growing?

     oh hell yeah

12.21.17  8:41 am   ive been listening to herbie hancock (such as secrets, manchild, mr hands) and i got strong you vibes from his music. do you draw inspiration from him/have heard his stuff?

     not really

12.21.17  6:48 am   in your video "history of the entire world, i guess", when you say "[...] about a kjghpillion degrees" do you refer to it in degree celsius, fahrenheit or kelvin?

     it doesn't really matter

     what is a kjghpillion?

     a lot

12.21.17  6:22 am   If you were a building, what building would you be?

     you get to decide, because it was your idea for me to be a building

12.21.17  5:11 am   how long have you been working on the new thing so far

     oh too long

     and on a scale of 1-10, how would you rate your experience with working on the new thing

     the entire scale at the same time

12.21.17  3:53 am   would you consider getting a melodica?

     no

      why or why not

     everyone else already has one

12.21.17  3:38 am   will you grant me your godly powers so i can do good on my finals that i have in like 6 hours?

     i don't have powers that will help for that. what you need is the answer sheet

12.21.17  12:29 am   What decade is your aesthetic?

     what

12.21.17  12:18 am   what's a use of a fax machine?

     tic tac toe

12.21.17  12:05 am   how has your songwriting changed from 2007 to 2017?

     it has gotten better and i have learned a wide variety of new tricks and techniques, and i am constantly discovering even more

      If not at all, perhaps you wasted all that time.

12.20.17  10:53 pm   hello yes what flavor of ice cream is the best?

     my question is if one flavour is best then why does anyone sell the other flavours

12.20.17  10:05 pm   Why do you have 2 songs called I Love You?

      i name songs how i think they should be named, not how i think other songs weren't named

12.20.17  9:11 pm   What would you ask yourself

     if what

12.20.17  9:07 pm   Bill, when you have in a song a major chord and then the same chord but minor, do you usually feels that the bass root should go up an octave? (and vice-versa, minor chord turning major the root going and octave down) ?

     you have to listen and see what you like best for that particular song at that particular moment

12.20.17  8:52 pm   why do I only get depressed at night?

     because you can't see all the joy that is all over the world

12.20.17  8:20 pm   soy sauce?

     ah that's a good question

12.20.17  7:58 pm   Can you please give me a journal prompt?

     open journal (journal is ready to be opened, please open your journal)

12.20.17  7:53 pm   do you own a melodica

     absolutely not

12.20.17  7:46 pm   what is your favorite condiment 

     dirt

12.20.17  6:38 pm   What was the purpose of stacking those books when you were stacking those books in that one video?

      7.5.16  1:28 am

12.20.17  6:28 pm   Do you answer questions in the order you receive them?

     yes

12.20.17  6:06 pm   Is faith in a major world religion a barrier to understanding your work?

     maybe but i really hope not

12.20.17  5:02 pm   can you invent a word

     what if i am tired out from inventing all the words i have invented previously

12.20.17  4:50 pm   What does it mean to use both replay and shuffle at the same time?¿

     i think it means it plays all the songs in a random order and then it plays them all again, in a random order

12.20.17  4:41 pm   do you think the world would be better off without currency?

     the world is currency
